name: Milam Wisp HOUR
description:
ENTER THE DREAMSCAPE OF MILAM WISP'S AMBIENT ANTHOLOGY "HOUR"

Explore the original artwork and ambiental music from Milam Wisp's HOUR in the form of a virtual art space. Become intimately acquainted with the impressions, timbres, tonal pictures of the Milam Wisp music project. A 3D art space for the PC and MAC and a VR experience for the Oculus Go.

facebook.com/milamwisp

Created in collaboration with Gigoia Studios:

https://gigoiastudios.itch.io/

A simple virtual art space to meditate, relax, contemplate and daydream...

An interesting way to explore the music of Milam Wisp.

Instructions for the Oculus GO:

Oculus GO (Sideload .APK): You can install the .APK version onto the Oculus GO via sideloading. For most people, the easiest way to do this is to install via SideQuest. After configuring your Oculus GO for developer mode, and installing/setting up Sidequest on your desktop, you can then just drag and drop the APK into SideQuest in the area in the top left corner.

Launch  Milam_Wisp_Art_Space  on the Oculus GO by navigating to the Library, selecting the Unknown Sources category on the left, look for  "Milam_Wisp_Art_Space" on the right, and run it.

Also, you can watch  a great tutorial video by Virtual Reality Oasis.

Controllers: Keyboard, Mouse, Xbox Controller, Oculus GO
